title: Kaepernick Works out for Raiders
description:
Laura Rutledge, Adam Schefter, Jeff Saturday, Booger McFarland and Mike Tanenbaum discuss Free agent Quarterback Colin Kaepernick's workout with the Las Vegas Raiders during their preseason OTAs, Mike McCarthy also shares his thoughts on the fatal school shooting that occurred in Texas yesterday.
